duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate powered industrial trucks (PIT) including standup forklifts, order selectors, reach trucks, powered pallet jacks, and dock stockers.
Perform daily checks on equipment and follow all safety guidelines to ensure a safe working environment.
Accurately pick/pack orders, restock picking bins, and sort, count, and receive merchandise.
Safely move products to and from pallet racks, work with conveyors, and load/unload trucks.
Organize warehouse storage space effectively and adhere to all safety, quality, and production standards.
Use a scanner to direct work, handle and feel, and lift and move boxes, products, or equipment weighing up to 50 pounds.
Demonstrate flexibility in daily task assignments and perform other general warehouse tasks as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED; 1-2 years of related experience as a certified equipment operator is ideal; knowledge of RF (radio frequency) scanners and basic computer skills are preferred.
